title: banned
body: Why do i get to wait many times for a match. The screen get black and then its my turn to pick its to late and im banned for 30 minuets. Why???

replies.body: This is not caused by a suspension, but a technical issue we're currently investigating.  Currently, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can serve as a workaround.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our tech team.  This will help us get more insight into what's going on.  Let me know if that clears things up!
